title: Batwing, Vol. 1: The Lost Kingdom
description: As a part of the acclaimed DC Comics--The New 52 event of September 2011, "Batwing" follows a soldier carrying on the legacy of The Dark Knight in the most tumultuous region on Earth. Meet Batwing, the Batman of Africa, as he takes on the villainous Massacre This volume collects issues 1-6 of "Batwing," part of the DC Comics--The New 52 event.
author: Judd Winick
